entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:25 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 9:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -8.3°C
Wind: N 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Blowing snow early in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h late in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
